x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: A fully integrated donation management system would streamline donation tracking, automate receipt generation, and allow for better donor insights. This would improve trust with donors and help drive future fundraising efforts.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Nonprofits face difficulties in tracking donations, issuing receipts, and managing donor relationships. Many organizations manually track donations in spreadsheets or disconnected systems, which can lead to errors and inefficiencies.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

The solution should integrate with ServiceNow’s Financial Management and CRM tools. It should automatically track donations, issue receipts, and allow users to run reports on donor activity. The system should also support recurring donations and donor segmentation for personalized outreach.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Payment gateway integration, security protocols for sensitive data, and reporting APIs would be required to provide a complete solution.
  • ServiceNow Finance Management
  • Customer Service Management
  • Reporting & Dashboard

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Security concerns around donor information and payment data, as well as ensuring that the system is easy to integrate with third-party fundraising platforms, could pose challenges.
